animeDescription:
A young boy, tired of the city, escapes into the country. When trying to bring vegetables to the market to sell, his cart breaks down and he exchanges the vegetables for a mystical seed. Returning home he plants the seed in a normal potâ€”only to find it growing into a planet.

(Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Miyazaki, Hayao', 'Director, Script, Screenplay'], ['Yasuda, Michiyo', 'Color Design'], ['Inoue, Naohisa', 'Original Creator'], ['Tsuru, Norihiro', 'Music']]
